scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.test:unit: NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --reporter spec test
scripts.test:coverage: NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --recursive --reporter tap test > test.tap && node_modules/.bin/istanbul report clover
